sys_update_xml.name: sys_hub_action_type_definition_a7f9538a07c31410d891f4be7c1ed0d6
sys_update_xml.payload:
publictruefalse897118ae871a030067017d5e27cb0b338994a77e53a60300eeadddeeff7b12a5Add User To Group<p>Add an existing user to a group in Azure AD.</p> <p><b>Inputs:</b></p> <ul> <li><strong>Group ID</strong> - ID of the group to which you wish to add a user.</li> <li><strong>User ID</strong> - ID of the user you wish to add to this group.</li> </ul> <p>The group and user should exist in Azure AD. If not found, output variable Status will be set as Error.</p> <p><b>Outputs:</b></p> <ul> <li><strong>Status</strong> - Will be set to “Success" if the request succeeds or “Error" if a failure in Azure AD occurs.</li> <li><strong>Error Message</strong> - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.</li> </ul> <p>The status will be Error only in case of any failure in Azure AD.</p> <p><b>Error Messages:</b></p> <ul> <li>Invalid Group ID</li> <li>Invalid User ID</li> <li>Member Already Exists in group</li> <li>Unauthorized</li> <li>Insufficient Permissions. Please Check OAuth Token and scope permission</li> <li>Forbidden Request. Please Check OAuth Token and scope permission</li> <li>Invalid Connection</li> <li>Unknown Error</li> </ul> <p>To use this action, a corresponding Azure AD connection and credential must be created and associated with the Azure AD Connection & Credential alias. <a target="_blank" href="http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:credentials-connections-alias">Learn More</a></p> <p><b>Note</b>: Requires a subscription for production use. <a target="_blank" href="https://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:IntegrationHub-licensing-information">Read More</a></p> <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Request access to Covid19 app">198d4d380a0a0b27007da2fbd5ccf5c2</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:e362682a072a9010d891f4be7c1ed0b3</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>onChange location</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }    
// 	locatttt = g_form.getValue('locat');
// 		alert('the location is ->' + locatttt);
	g_form.clearOptions('applicat');
	g_form.clearValue('applicat');
 
	if ((newValue == 'Tucson') || (newValue == 'Vancouver') || (newValue == 'Brazil') || (newValue == 'Brisbane'))    {

		g_form.addOption('applicat', 'PreShiftScreen', 'PreShiftScreen');
// 		g_form.removeOption('applicat', 'InitialPreScreen');
// 		g_form.removeOption('applicat', 'GateAccessScreen');
// 		g_form.removeOption('applicat', 'NursePreFlightQuickScan (GEMCO only)');
		}
	if ((newValue == 'Perth') || (newValue == 'Melrose arch') || (newValue == 'Singapore'))    {
		g_form.addOption('applicat', 'PreShiftScreen', 'PreShiftScreen');
		g_form.addOption('applicat', 'GateAccessScreen', 'GateAccessScreen');
// 				g_form.addOption('applicat', 'GateAccessScreen');
// 		g_form.removeOption('applicat', 'InitialPreScreen');
// 		g_form.removeOption('applicat', 'NursePreFlightQuickScan (GEMCO only)');
		}
	if (newValue == 'CMSA')    {
		g_form.addOption('applicat', 'InitialPreScreen', 'InitialPreScreen');
// 		g_form.removeOption('applicat', 'PreShiftScreen');
// 		g_form.removeOption('applicat', 'GateAccessScreen');
// 		g_form.removeOption('applicat', 'NursePreFlightQuickScan (GEMCO only)');
		}
	if (newValue == 'GEMCO')    {
		g_form.addOption('applicat', 'NursePreFlightQuickScan (GEMCO only)', 'NursePreFlightQuickScan (GEMCO only)');
// 	g_form.removeOption('applicat', 'InitialPreScreen');
// 	g_form.removeOption('applicat', 'PreShiftScreen');
// 	g_form.removeOption('applicat', 'GateAccessScreen');

		}	
	if (newValue == 'Africa')    {
		g_form.addOption('applicat', 'InitialPreScreen', 'InitialPreScreen');
		g_form.addOption('applicat', 'GateAccessScreen', 'GateAccessScreen');
// 		g_form.removeOption('applicat', 'PreShiftScreen');
// 		g_form.removeOption('applicat', 'NursePreFlightQuickScan (GEMCO only)');
		}		
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
 
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-20 11:22:54</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5fde6cb8073e9010d891f4be7c1ed0d6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>37</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onChange location</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_5fde6cb8073e9010d891f4be7c1ed0d6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-08-22 08:57:20</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

publictruefalseb0568f4693220300dc2d925cf67ffbb80f09774073c82300ed042ea3c4f6a79fCreate User<html> <p>This action will create a user with the given details.</p> <p><b>Inputs:</b></p> <ul> <li><b>Account Enabled</b></li> <li><b>Display Name</b> - Name displayed in the address book for the user</li> <li><b>Email Alias</b> - Alias configured for an email account. A single email account can have more than one alias</li> <li><b>User Login ID</b> - Login User ID is same as User Principal Name(UPN). <b>Example</b>: johndoe@snc.com</li> <li><b>Password</b></li> <li><b>Force Change password</b> - Force the user to change password during next login</li> <li><b>Given Name</b></li> <li><b>Surname</b></li> <li><b>Country</b></li> <li><b>City</b></li> <li><b>Department</b> - Name of the department to which user belongs to. <b>Example</b>: HR, Sales etc</li> <li><b>Mobile Number</b></li> <li><b>Job Title</b></li> <li><b>Physical Delivery Office Name</b> - Office location of the user</li> <li><b>Postal Code</b></li> <li><b>Preferred Language</b></li> <li><b>State</b></li> <li><b>Street Address</b></li> <li><b>Telephone Number</b></li> <li><b>Usage Location</b> - Two letter country code (ISO standard 3166)</li> </ul> <p><b>Outputs:</b> <ul> <li><b>Error Message</b> - only populated in case of Error(string)</li> <li><b>Status</b> - Success or Error (string)</li> <li><b>User ID</b> - This will be populated if Status is Success. It contains the newly created User ID (string)</li> </ul> </p> <p>If this action fails, the error messages will reflect the exact error</p> <p><b>Error Messages:</b> <ul> <li>The value for 'Email Alias' is not valid.</li> <li>The value for User Login ID is not valid</li> <li>A user with the provided User login ID already exists</li> <li>The specified password does not comply with password complexity requirements</li> <li>The specified value for Business Phones is invalid</li> <li>The preferred Language value is invalid. It follows ISO Standard 639-1</li> <li>The Usage Location value is invalid. It follows ISO standard 3166</li> <li>Unauthorized</li> <li>Insufficient Permissions.Check if the correct scopes are defined as part of OAuth Configuration</li> <li>Forbidden Request.The access token is expired or may not be available </li> <li>Invalid Connection</li> <li>Unknown Error</li> </ul> </p> <p>To use this action, a corresponding Azure AD connection and credential must be created and associated with the Azure AD Connection & Credential alias. <a target="_blank" href="http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:credentials-connections-alias">Learn More</a></p> <p><b>Note</b>: Requires a subscription for production use. <a target="_blank" href="https://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:IntegrationHub-licensing-information">Read More</a></p> </html>
